data.author: DocF87

changelog.release_notes:
new:
- Pebble Time: all colors customizable 
- Pebble OG: added grey color 
- displaying am/pm in 12h-mode 
- vibration on full hour 
- when you phone is without internet connection last weather data is displayed (indicated by a dot above temperature) 
- charging indicator 
- symbols in lower row (instead of text) for min./max. temperature and for sunrise/sunset

bugfixes:
- displaying bluetooth warning when going back to the watchface while there is no bluetooth connection 
- displaying sunrise/sunset times should now respect am/pm setting on watch 
- stability improvement for updating weather information
- hopefully fixing a bug where no date information was displayed
- fixing a bug not updating weather information

- weather icons and background colorized
- better weather information request

- preventing the annoying delay of inverting the colors while loading the watchface if the background is set to black color
- new option for additional weather information in lower row (sunrise or sunset displayed depending on current daytime)
- preparations for color in SDK 3.0

- fixing a bug where incorrect weather information for some locations was displayed (thanks for bug-report!)
- fixing a bug where in some weather conditions wrong icons have been displayed
- improvements of weather icons

- fixing a bug showing wrong temperature unit in min/max temperature info (Thanks for bug report!)
- further preparation for SDK3.0
- optimizations

- fixes configuration-menu (sorry for that!)
- 12h/24h style time format for sunrise/sunset
- preparation for SDK 3.0

- fixing a bug not displaying the weather icon
- minor tweaks in weather-bitmaps and adding a tornado-bitmap
- (hopefuly) correct international date formats

data.description:
Simple Watchface providing time/date and weather information: 
- battery indicator as separator between date/time and weather 
- current weather 
- weather forecast: min/max temperature or sunrise/sunset 
- color picker for backgrounds in configuration menu 
- vibration on lost bluetooth connection 

Weather information by Yahoo Weather. Weather icons by Daniel Vierich.

latest_release.release_notes: - hopefully fixing a bug where no date information was displayed

data.title: Clear Face
